title: AI-Assisted Math and Programming for Business Analytics
description: Success in business analytics (aka data science for business) requires a solid foundation in mathematics, statistics, and programming. This course is designed to enhance students’ ability to solve math and programming challenges using AI tools like ChatGPT (Code Interpreter) and GitHub Co-Pilot X. This AI-assisted course will be the start of the students’ learning journey and will set students up to create analytical solutions to important business problems. Prerequisites: restricted to MS in business analytics students or instructor approval or department approval.
